brand_info.name: EA7 Emporio Armani
brand_info.tagline: Promoting the sport identity of the brand
brand_info.positioning: Technical sportswear with strong sport identity combined with Armani design DNA
brand_info.vision: Promote sport values through performance-driven design with Italian style
brand_info.mission: Deliver technical and performance-oriented sportswear while maintaining refined Armani aesthetics
brand_info.origin_story: EA7 was introduced in 2004 by Giorgio Armani as a sports-focused extension of Emporio Armani, with the number 7 symbolizing performance and sport values

brand_values.brand_promise: High-performance sportswear with refined design and visible brand authority
differentiators: Strong EA7 logo as graphic element
Blend of training, lifestyle, and performance contexts

psychographics.behavior: Chooses visible branded technical apparel suitable for training and everyday wear

logo.usage_rules: High contrast, never distorted, used as hero element
logo.safe_area: Clear space around logo equal to logo height

color_system.color_usage_rules: Monochrome base with selective energetic accents

layout_principles.grid_system: Centered composition with strong negative space

style.camera_feel: Crisp studio and dynamic outdoor sport imagery

technical.lighting: Sculpted studio and natural outdoor light
technical.color_grading: Cool, slightly desaturated with neon accents

product_presentation.hero_visibility: Logo and garment function clearly visible
